desc: Primerug Off-page SEO strategy:The website is lacking in many areas in terms of Off-page SEO and requires alot ofwork and relevant content generation. The keyword chosen to rank the site is modernrugs . Keeping in view this keyword new content will be generated and existing contentwill be optimized to have high keyword density as compared to other competitors.Homepage optimization:1. Create company related info and other content based on the keyword.2. Each section can contain some textual introduction stuffing in primary keywordand other keywords related to the section.3. The content should be unique and must match the required keyword density.Category pages optimization:1. A category should contain a short description of category specific content.2. Each category should contain category specific keywords.Sale pages optimization:1. Sale/Offers should boost sale related keywords for example all rugs for sale.2. A short description for sale pages is also helpful in increasing the sale relatedkeywords.Product pages optimization:1. Product pages should contain only product related keywords and should notcontain any category/sale/homepage used keywords as it will becomecompetitive against those keywords and might create problems for other majorpages to rank highly.2. A blog page can be created and can contain all the products as individual postsbut with a different context. For example how a rug can be selected for a room oran area / or how modern rugs are getting trendy among different customers etc.Backlinks:Currently the website is lacking alot in terms of backlinks as compared to competitors.Some high quality backlinks will be provided from high ranking websites for thehomepage mainly. For some of the sites an article will be written related to the site andposted on the high ranking site.
title: Get Traffic to my Website
